title: Handaxe
content:
Handaxe Common 1~6 Damage 1d6 Slashing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A straightforward hatchet, dulled slightly from chopping wood - or bones. Handaxe Light Thrown 0.9 16

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A straightforward hatchet, dulled slightly from chopping wood - or bones.

Handaxe Light Thrown

Handaxe is one of the Simple Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, et
